branding.headline: Cloud Voice for your business
branding.subheadline: Powered by Telstra TIPT and Cisco Webex

executive_summary: Your business phone system, modernised. Keep your numbers, add mobility, and simplify management under one TBTC account manager.
key_benefits: Unlimited local, national and mobile calls included
Softphone and desk phone options with Webex calling
Keep your existing numbers and call flows
Australian support with a dedicated local account manager
commercial_terms: 36‑month term on TIPT licences and handsets
Subject to site qualification and standard Telstra serviceability

features.title: Cisco 9861 IP Phone
features.description: Coloured screen, HD audio, multiple lines. Reliable desk phone for busy teams.

features.title: Cisco Meraki MX67W Security Appliance
features.description: All‑in‑one firewall, SD‑WAN and Wi‑Fi. Cloud managed, simple to monitor.

features.title: Webex App for Desktop & Mobile
features.description: Place and receive calls, message, and meet from anywhere. Your extension, everywhere.
